GSP33brsgor2u:2366: sargādau paramāṇūnāṃ ca skandhānāṃ ca svataḥsaṃghātastāvanna saṃbhavati, acetanatvāt /

GSP33brsgor2u:2421: kimavidyādayaḥ saṃghātasya gamakā utotpādakā iti vikalpyādye saṃghātasyotpādakaṃ kiñcidvācyaṃ, tannāstītyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:2425_0: yadā sthireṣvaṇuṣu saṃghātayogyeṣu kartṛṣu cādṛṣṭasahāyeṣu satsu jñānābhāvamātreṇa
GSP33brsgor2u:2433: svābhāvikaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃghātānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena pravāho na saṃhantāramapekṣate,

GSP33brsgor2u:2490: viṣayakaraṇasahakārisaṃskārāścaturvidhā hetavastān pratītya prāpya cittaṃ rūpādivijñānaṃ caittāścittātmakāḥ sukhādayaśca jāyanta iti pratijñārthaḥ /

GSP33brsgor2u:2513: pratīpā pratikūlā saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā,
GSP33brsgor2u:2521: tasmin saṃtāne caramakṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇāntaraṃ karoti vā na vā /

GSP33brsgor2u:2553: śabdo vastuniṣṭhaḥ guṇatvāt, gandhādivadityanumānādākāśasya vastutvaṃ sidhyati /

GSP33brsgor2u:3118: yaduktamavaktavyatvaṃ tat kiṃ kenāpi śabdenāvācyatvamuta sakṛdanekaśabdāvācyatvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3124: na cārthasya yugapadviruddhadharmavāñchāyāṃ vakturmūkatvamātramavaktavyapadena vivakṣitamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3135: ananuṣṭhānādbadhyanta ityārhatatantrāvadhṛtasvabhāvānāṃ trividhajīvānāṃ traividhyaniyamo 'pi na syādityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3160: kiñca bāladehamātra ātmā tataḥ sthūle yuvadehe kvacit syāditi kṛtsnadehaḥ sajīvo na syādityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3162: yathā dīpāvayavānāṃ ghaṭe saṃkoco gehe vikāsastathā jīvāvayavānāmiti dehamānatvaniyamaṃ śaṅkate-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3164: dīpāṃśavajjīvāṃśā bhinnadeśā ekadeśā veti vikalpyādye 'lpadehādbahirapi jīvaḥ syāditi dūṣayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3166: dīpasya tu na ghaṭādbahiḥ sattvamadhikāvayavānāṃ vināśāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3174: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ | BBs_2,2.35 |
GSP33brsgor2u:3175: evaṃ jīvāvayavā nityā itimate dehamānatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3176: saṃprati jīvasya kecideva kūṭasthā avayavā anye tvāgamāpāyina iti śaṅkate-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3188: ādye kalpe doṣāntaraṃ vadan kalpāntaramādāya dūṣayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3194: kiñcātmana āgamāpāyiśīlāvayavatve sati kiyanta āyāntyavayavāḥ kiyanto 'payantītyajñānādātmaniścayābhāvādanirmokṣaḥ syādityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3199: gotvavatpratyekaṃ samāptāvekasmiñcharīra ātmanānātvaṃ syādato na dehaparimāṇatvasāvayavatve ātmana ityupasaṃharati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3210: sig vastraṃ vigataṃ yebhyaste visico digambarāsteṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3216: anatireke janmādivikāro vināśo muktyabhāva ityuktadoṣaprasaṅgāt saṃtānātmapakṣo 'nupapanna iti sūtrārthaḥ //35//
GSP33brsgor2u:3221: yaṃ sthūlaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā dehaṃ gṛhṇāti taddehaparimāṇa eva jīva iti niyamaṃ dūṣayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3225: na cāprayojakatā, parimāṇanāśe satyātmano 'pi nāśādantyaparimāṇanityatvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3241: luñcitakeśamatanirasanānantaraṃ jaṭādhāriśaivamataṃ buddhisthaṃ nirākriyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3243: sāmānyata īśvaranirāsa evātra kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkate-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3249_0: advitīyabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ jagaditi vadato vedāntasamanvayasya kartaiveśvaro naprakṛtiriti
GSP33brsgor2u:3249_1: śaivādimatena virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tanmatasya mānamūlatvādvirodhe sati vedāntoktadvayabrahmāsiddhiriti
GSP33brsgor2u:3262: vimataṃ sakartṛkaṃ, kāryatvāt, ghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikāḥ kartāramīśvaraṃ sādhayanti /
GSP33brsgor2u:3263: karmaphalaṃ saparikarābhijñadātṛkaṃ, kālāntarabhāviphalatvāt, sevāphalavaditi gautamā digambarāśca /
GSP33brsgor2u:3274: na cāgama eva mānam, āgamamānatvaniścaye mūlaniścayastanniścaye tanniścaya ityanyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3275: naca puruṣavacasāṃ svatomānatvaṃ yuktaṃ, mitho virodhena tattvāvyavasthānācca /
GSP33brsgor2u:3278: tathāca loke yādṛśāḥ kartāro dṛṣṭāntādṛśā eva jagatkartāro rāgadveṣādimantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3279: yadi loke vicitraprāsādādikarturekatvādyadarśane 'pi jagatkartari lāghavādekatvaṃ nityajñānaṃ nirdeṣatvaṃ ca kalpyeta,
GSP33brsgor2u:3284: asmākaṃ tvapauruṣeyatayā svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvayā śrutyā svaprameyabodhane dṛṣṭāntānapekṣayā bhavatyeva laukikakartṛviparītādvitīyakartrupādānātmakasarvajñanirdeṣeśvaranirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3285: nirṇīte ca tasmin dharmigrāhakamānabādhānna rāgādidoṣāpādānasyāvakāśa ityānumānikeśvaravādibhyo vaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3288: yadi karturupādānatvamadṛṣṭatvānna kalpyate tarhi nirdeṣatvasyāpyadṛṣṭatvādyo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti vyāptidṛṣṭeśca jagatkartā doṣavān syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3291: na cotkarṣasamā jātiḥ, vyāpakadharmāpādānāt, doṣābhāve tadvyāpyaviṣamakartṛtvāyogācca /
GSP33brsgor2u:3293: yathā śabdo yadi kṛtakatvena hetunā ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāttarhi tenaiva hetunā sāvayavo 'pi syāditi /
GSP33brsgor2u:3294: na hyanityatvasya vyāpakaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ gandhādau vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3295: nanu prāṇikarmaprerita īśvaro viṣamaphalān prāṇinaḥ karoti na svecchayeti śaṅkate-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3301: atītakarmaṇā prerita īśvaro vartamānaṃ karma tatphalāya prerayatītyanāditvātpreryaprerakabhāvasya nānupapattiriti śaṅkate-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3304: naca tadapīśvareṇa preritaṃ sadīśvaraṃ prerayati, uktānyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3305: tato 'pyatītakarmapreriteśvarapreritaṃ tadeveśvaraṃ vartamāne karmaṇi phaladānāya prerayati cet /
GSP33brsgor2u:3309: yattu phaladāne īśvarasya karma nimittamātraṃ na prerakamiti noktadoṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:3321: udāsīnaḥ pravartaka iti ca vyāhṛtamiti yogānpratyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3330: sa ca saṃyegaḥ samavāyo vā nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3333: īśvarapreritapradhānakāryaṃ jagaditi siddhaṃ cet saṃbandhakalpanā syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3367: naca yadyenādhiṣṭheyaṃ tattadīyabhogahetutve sati pratyakṣamiti vyatirekavyāptau karaṇeṣu vyabhicāratādavasthyamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3373: jīve karaṇakṛtā bhogadayo dṛśyante, īśvare tu pradhānakṛtāste na dṛśyanta ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3380: yaḥ pravartakaścetanaḥ sa śarīrīti loke vyāptidṛṣṭerīśvarasya ca śarīrānupapatterna pravartakatvamiti sūtrārthamāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3382: kimataṃ seśvaraṃ, kāryatvāt, rāṣṭravaditi kalpayato rājavatsaśarīra eveśvaraḥ syādityuktam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3385: naca nityaṃ śarīraṃ sargātprāgapi saṃbhavatīti vācyaṃ, śarīrasya bhautikatvaniyamādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3389: jīvasyaiva śarīraṃ bhautikamīśvarasya tu svecchānirmitaṃ prāgapi syādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3397: evamīśvarasya śuṣkatarkeṇa kartṛtvanirṇayo netyupapādya nityatvasarvajñatvanirṇayo 'pi na saṃbhavatītyāha sūtrakāraḥ-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3403: yadyapi saṃkhyāvatvamātraṃ hetuḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi sarvajñaniścayena hetvasiddhinirāsaṃ dyotayituṃ niścitapadam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3410: nanu pradhānapuruṣeśvarāstraya iti jñāte 'pi jīvānāmānantyātkathaṃ saṃkhyāniścayaḥ, tatrāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3416: māṣarāśivatkeṣāñcijjīvānāṃ saṃghastadbandhaśca naśyedityevaṃ sarvamukteridānīṃ śūnyaṃ jagatsyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3434: tasmāt kevalakartrīśvaravādasya nirmūlatvānna tartrupādānādvayeśvarasamanvayavirodha iti siddham //41//
GSP33brsgor2u:3448: sa kiṃ jīvotpattyādyaṃśe mānaṃ naveti saṃdehe bādhānupalambhānmānamiti pūrvapakṣayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3459: yathoktavyūhavantaṃ sarvaprakṛtiṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ paramātmānamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:3467: 'samāhitaḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvā'iti, 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate'ityādyā ca śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3479: yasmāt kartuḥ karaṇotpattirna dṛśyate tasmādasaṃgatā kalpanetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3480: siddhānāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā karteti prasiddhyartho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3483: nanu loke kaścicchilpivaraḥ kuṭhāraṃ nirmāya tena vṛkṣaṃ chinattīti dṛṣṭamiti cet /
GSP33brsgor2u:3487: vinaiva karaṇaṃ kartṛtve vā manovaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ //43//
GSP33brsgor2u:3511: kiṃ catvāraḥ svatantrā bhinnā eva utaikasya vikāratvenābhinnāḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3514: dvitīye vikārāḥ prakṛtitulyā vā nyūnā vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:3519: yadi nyūnā api bhagavato vyūhāstadā catuṣṭvavyāghāta ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3528: ādipadāt pradyumnāniruddhau bhinnāvātmana ityuktvātmana evaite iti viruddhoktigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3534: iti śrīparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor2u:3536: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ #
GSP33brsgor2u:3554: yathā mithovirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca parapakṣā upekṣyāstathā śrutipakṣo 'pi upekṣya iti śaṅkotthāne pādadvayasyārambhāt pūrvapādena dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiriti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3557: jīvasya prāṇānāṃ cotpattiṃ 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti'iti vājinaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3565_1: saṃdehe yadyutpattistadā vākyabhedena virodhādaprāmāṇyamanayoḥ śrutyoriti pūrvapakṣayiṣyannādāvanutpattikṣamekadeśi gṛhṇātītyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3578: ekasya yugapatkāryadvayāsaṃbandhe 'pi krameṇa saṃbandhasaṃbhavādekavākyateti mukhyasiddhāntī śaṅkate-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3591: kiñca satpadārtha ātmā chāndogye tejasa upādānaṃ śrūyate, atra tu vāyuriti naikavākyatetyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3597: evaṃ śrutyorvirodhādaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣe prāpte sa eva viyadanutpattivādi svamatena prāmāṇyaṃ brūta ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3599: evamādhyāyasamāpteradhikaraṇeṣu prathamaṃ virodhācchrutyaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ tata ekadeśisiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3600: paścānmukhyasiddhānte śrutīnāmavirodhenaika vākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayasiddhiriti phalaṃ kramaścetyavagantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3601: tatra śrutyorvirodhe satyadhyayanavidhyupāttayoraprāmāṇyayogādviyadutpattyasaṃbhavarūpatakrānugṛhītacchāndogyaśrutirmukhyārthā itarā gauṇītyavirodha ityekadeśimataṃ vivṛṇoti-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3605: saṃyoga eva hi dravyasyāsamavāyikāraṇamataḥ samavāyyasamavāyinorabhāvānna hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3610: mūrtadravyāśrayatvaṃ hyakāśasya kāryaṃ, tacca pralaye 'pyasti paramāṇvāśrayatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3673: evamākāśasyānutpattau sarvaśrutīnāmavirodha ityekadeśisiddhāntaḥ prāptastaṃ mukhyasiddhāntī dūṣayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3681: tathāpi jīvādivadanutpannasyāpi nabhaso brahmaṇi kalpitatvenāvyatirekātpratijñāsiddhiḥ kiṃ na syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:3690: tasmātpratijñāsiddhaye ākāśasya kāryatvenaivāvyatireko vācya iti dṛṣṭāntasṛṣṭisārvātmyaśabdānāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3694: yajuṣi pratijñāsādhakā 'idaṃ sarvam'itiśabdāḥ, ātharvaṇe 'brahmaivedam'iti śabdā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3702: vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavena tayoḥ śākhābhedena prāthamyavyavasthāyā ayogāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:3712: kiñca sā śrutiḥ kiṃ tejojanmaparā, uta tejojanma viyadanucpattiścetyubhayaparā /
GSP33brsgor2u:3722: nānārthakaprayoge tu paya ānayetyādāvāvṛttyā vākyabheda eva /
GSP33brsgor2u:3726: ekasya śabdasyāvṛttiṃ vinānekārthatvaṃ nāsti cedasṛjateti śabdasya chāndogya upasaṃhṛtākāśādisaṃbandhārthamāvṛttidoṣaḥ syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3731: śrutyantarasthaḥ kramaḥ śrutyantare grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3735: tejaḥprāthamyasvīkāre ākāśasargo dharmi taddharmaḥ prāthamyaṃ ceti dvayaṃ śrutaṃ bādhanīyamiti gauravam,
GSP33brsgor2u:3736: ākāśaprāthamye tvārthikatejaḥ sargaprāthamyamātrabādha iti lāghavamiti matvāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3738: kiñca pradhānadharmityāgādvaraṃ guṇabhūtasya tejaḥprāthamyasya dharmasya tyāga ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3740: kiñca kiṃ sṛṣṭiparaśrutisiddhatvāttejaḥprāthamyaṃ gṛhyata uta prathamasthāne tejasaḥ sargaśrutyārthātprāthamyabhānāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3745: yaduktaṃ vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavādubhayoḥ prāthamyaṃ śākhābhedena vyavasthitaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:3751: viyadanutpattivādinoktamanūdya pratijñāyā advitīyaśruteśca mukhyārthatātparyāvagamānna gauṇārthateti dūṣayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3754: udakaṃ kṣīrasthamapi kṣīrajñānānna gṛhyate bhedāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3762: ubhayagauṇatve 'dbhutavadupanyāso mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaistatsādhanaṃ ca na syāditi doṣāntaramāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3768: kāryameva vastvekadeśa ākāśo notpadyate sāmagrīśūnyatvādityatra ākāśo vikāraḥ vibhaktatvāt ghaṭādivaditi satpratipakṣamāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3770: yo vibhaktaḥ sa vikāra ityanvayamuktvā yastvavikāraḥ sa na vibhakto yathātmeti vyatirikavyāptimāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3777: dharmisamānasattākavibhāgasya hetutvātparamārthātmani vibhāgasya kalpitatvena bhinnasattākatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3779: atra cājñānānyadravyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam, ato nājñānatatsaṃbandhādau vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3783: ghaṭavadityābhāsatulyamidamanumānamityāśaṅkyātmanaḥ paramakāraṇatvena śrutasya kāryatve śūnyatāprasaṅga iti bādhakasattvāttasyābhāvatvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3784: nātra kiñcidbādhakamasti pratyuta ākāśasyākāryatve nityānekadravyakalpanā śrautapratijñāhānyādayo bādhakāḥ santīti nābhāsatulyatetyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3789: ādye yo jñātā sa pariśiṣyata iti na śūnyatā /
GSP33brsgor2u:3798: yaduktaṃ sureśvarācāryaiḥ-'pramātā ca pramāṇaṃ ca prameyaṃ pramitistathā /
GSP33brsgor2u:3801: yathā śrutirāha-'puruṣaḥ svayaṃ jyotiḥ', 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti ca /
GSP33brsgor2u:3804: nanu prameyasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3807: ātmāpi mānādhīnasiddhikaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3810: gehe ghaṭo dṛṣṭo na veti jñānasaṃśaye na dṛṣṭa iti vyatirekaniścaye cārthasvarūpaniścayāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3816: svaprakāśasyāpi bādhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3818: jaḍaṃ hi parāyattaprakāśatvādāgantukaṃ bādhayogyaṃ na prakāśātmasvarūpaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3821: nahi sunipuṇenāpi svābhāvo draṣṭuṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3822: evaṃ svataḥ sphūrtitvādātmā na bādhya ityuktvā svataḥ sattākatvācca na bādhya ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3824: jñānajñeyayoḥ sattāvyabhicāre 'pi jñātuḥ sadaikarūpatvānna sattāvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3825: māstu jīvato jñāturanyathāsvabhāvaḥ, mṛtasya tu syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3828: anyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ mithyātvaṃ vā saṃbhāvayitumapi na śakyam,
GSP33brsgor2u:3843: naca rajjavādi na dravyāntaramiti vācyaṃ, paṭāderapi tathātvāpātāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3852: yadyapyadṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyukte aṇumanasī ādyakarmārambhake tathāpi karmasamavāyina ekatvādanekatvaniyamabhaṅga ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3858: na tvabhyupagamyate tasmānnaiṣa niyama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3859: yattu kṣīraparamāṇuṣu rasāntarotpattau taireva dadhyārambha iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:3864: loke kartu- sahāyadarśanādasahāyādbrahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ sarga iti, tatrāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:3869: śabdādimānākāśaḥ pralaye nāsti, 'nāsīdrajo no vyoma'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3872: na hyākāśābhāvastaddharmo vā kāṭhinyaṃ kintu mūrtadravyaviśeṣastasaṃyogaviśeṣo vā kāṭhinyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3881: tacca svasamānasattākaguṇavattvam, ato nirguṇātmani na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3885: sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo vā vibhutvaṃ nirguṇātmani dṛṣṭānte nāsti /
GSP33brsgor2u:3894: nanu 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā'iti śrutirnityatvenaiva sāmyaṃ brūte,

GSP33brsgor2u:4459: tatrātmāṇutvavibhutvaśrutīnāṃ virodhādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvaṇutvaṃ jīvasya vibhutvamīśvarasyetyavirodha ityekadeśipakṣo darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4465: etena jīvasya brahmabedajñāne 'ṇutvābhāvadhīstasyāṃ tadityanyonyāśraya iti nirastam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4473: yadyaṇvātmasaṃbandhasya tvagvyāptyā dehavyāpinī vedanā syāttarhyatiprasaṅga iti dūṣayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4480: naca siddhānte tvagātmasaṃbandhasya vyāpitvātkaṇṭakasaṃbandhe dehavyāpivedanāprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4482: na caivaṃ viṣayatvaksaṃbandha eva taddheturastu kimātmavyāptyeti vācyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4484: na caiṣāṃ vyāpakānāṃ kāryāṇāmalpamupādānaṃ saṃbhavati kāryasyopādānādviśleṣānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4494: pūrvaṃ caitanyasya guṇatvamupetya tadvyāptyā guṇyātmāṇutvaṃ nirastaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4499: 'antarā vijñānamanasī hṛdi hi'iti ca prakṛtā buddhiryogyatvāttacchabdena parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:4502: akāryakāraṇadravyasamānādhikaraṇatayā tattvamasīti vākyasya so 'yamiti vākyavadakhaṇḍābhedārthatvādānantyaṃ satyamaṇutvamadhyastamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4507: buddherguṇena nimittenātmanyadhyasto guṇo bhavati tenātmaguṇenādhyastenaivārāgraparimāṇo 'pakṛṣṭaśca jīvo dṛṣṭaḥ svatastvananta evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4508: 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā nānyairdevaistapasā karmaṇā vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:4509: jñānaprasādena viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ'ityuktvā 'eṣo 'ṇurātmā'ityuktaḥ para eva,
GSP33brsgor2u:4515: yadi caitanyaṃ prajñā tadā bhedopacāra ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4517: nanu caitanyaṃ guṇa iti bhedo mukhyo 'stu, netyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4530: yāvadātmabhāvitvāc ca na doṣas taddarśanāt | BBs_2,3.30 |
GSP33brsgor2u:4531: nanu svataḥ saṃsāritvamastu kiṃ buddhyupādhinetyata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4533: samāno buddhitādātmyāpannaḥ san vijñānaṃ brahma tanmayo vikāro 'ṇurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4559: svāpe bījātmanā sato buddhayādeḥ prabodhe 'bhivyaktirityatra śrutimāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4572: ' 'cittaṃ ca cetayitavyam'iti tatra tatra śrutiṣu manaādipadavācyaṃ tāvadbuddhidravyaṃ prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4575: garvavṛttiko 'haṅkāro vijñānaṃ citpradhānaṃ smṛtipradhānaṃ vā cittamityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4576: yadyapi sākṣipratyakṣasiddhamantaḥkaraṇaṃ śrutyanūditaṃ ca tathāpi pratyakṣaśrutyorvivadamānaṃ prati vyāsaṅgānupapattyā tatsādhayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4580: pañcendriyāṇāṃ pañcaviṣayasaṃbandhe sati nityaṃ yugapatpañcopalabdhayaḥ syuḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4584: nanu satyapi kāragrisaṃyoge dāhakādācitkatvavadupalabdhikādācitkatvamastu kiṃ manasetyāśaṅkyānyataraniyamo vetyetadvyācaṣṭe-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4586: satyāṃ sāmagryāṃ nityopalabdhirvāṅgīkāryā anyatarasya kāraṇasya kenapicchaktipratibandhaniyamo vāṅgīkāryaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4594: tathāhi-rasādīnāṃ sahopalabdhiprāptau rasabubhutsārūpo vyāsaṅgo rūpādyupalabdhipratibandhako vācyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4596: tatrātmano 'saṅganirguṇakūṭasthasya guṇitvāyogānmana eva guṇitvenaiṣṭavyamiti vyāsaṅgānupapattyā manaḥsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4602: teṣāṃ mate punaricchādīnāmātmadharmatvaṃ teṣāṃ mano durlabhamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4617_0: sa nityaścidrūpo mahānātmā kartā na vetyasaṅgatvaśrutīnāṃ vidhyādiśrutīnāṃ ca vipratipattyā
GSP33brsgor2u:4625: nanu buddhikartṛtvena śāstrārthavattāstu kiṃ jīvakartṛtvena tatrāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4627: mayedaṃ kartavyamiti bodhasamarthasya cetanasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ na tvacetanāyā buddheḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4628: kiṃ ca bhokturātmana eva kartṛtā vācyā 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari'iti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ //33//
GSP33brsgor2u:4634: amṛtaḥ sa ātmā yatheṣṭamīyate gacchatīti vihāropadeśāt, ātmā kartā //34//
GSP33brsgor2u:4639: prāṇānāṃ madhye vijñānena buddhyā vijñānasamarthamindriyajātamādāya śete iti prāṇān gṛhītvā parivartata iti upādānakartṛtvamātmanaḥ akartṛtve upādānānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ //35//
GSP33brsgor2u:4643: vyapadeśāc ca kriyāyāṃ na cen nirdeśaviparyayaḥ | BBs_2,3.36 |
GSP33brsgor2u:4644: vijñānaśabdo jīvasya nirdeśo na cet tadā prathamānirdeśādviparyayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4646: tasmādiha śrutau tanuta ityākhyātena kartṛvācinā vijñānapadasya sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśātkriyāyāmātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ sūcyata iti sūtrabhāṣyayorarthaḥ //36//
GSP33brsgor2u:4653: jīvaḥ svatantraścediṣṭameva kuryādasvatantraścenna kartā, 'svatantraḥ kartā'iti nyāyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4654: satyapi svātantrye kārakavaicitryādaniyatā pravṛttiriti sūtreṇa pariharati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4660: nanvātmā viṣayasaṃbandhāya karaṇānyapekṣate cetkathaṃ svatantra ityāśaṅkyamāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4662: svātantryaṃ nāma na svānyānapekṣatvam, īśvarasyāpi prāṇikarmāpekṣatvenāsvātantryaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4663_0: kiṃ tu svetarakārakaprayoktṛtve sati kārakāpreryatvaṃ svātantryaṃ tena svatantro
GSP33brsgor2u:4674: sa kartā sa eva jīvo yattadapekṣitaṃ karaṇaṃ tanmana iti jīvakartṛtvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brsgor2u:4691: sāṃkhyanirāsenātmanaḥ kartṛtve sādhite bādhakābhāvāt tatsatyamiti mīmāṃsakādipakṣaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4693: ahaṃ kartetyanubhavasahitakartṛtvaśrutibalena tasyāgamasya stāvakatvāditi prāpta utsūtrameva siddhāntayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4697: nanu kartṛtvaṃ nāma kriyāśaktirmuktāvapyasti tathāpi śaktikāryasya kriyārūpaśakyasyābhāvānmukteḥ puruṣārthatvasiddhiriti śaṅkate-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4701: muktau śaktisattve kāryamapi syāt, śakyābhāve śaktyayogāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4702: asti hi pralaye 'pi kāryaṃ punarudbhavayogyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4703: tathāca śaktyā dharmādinimitteḥ sahitakāryākṣepānmuktilopa iti pariharati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4705: sanimittasya kāryasya śakyatvena śaktyā saṃbandhānnamittānāmapi paramparayā śaktisaṃbandhitvamuktaṃ mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4707: yadvā śaktirlakṣaṇamākṣepakaṃ yasya kāryasya tena kāryeṇa yaḥ saṃbandhasteneti vyadhikaraṇe tṛtīye /
GSP33brsgor2u:4723: buddhyādisaṃghātādvyatirikto yadi parasmādanyaścetano na syāttadā para eva saṃsārī prasajyeta,
GSP33brsgor2u:4727: na vayaṃ śuddhasya ciddhātoḥ parasya bandhaṃ vadāmaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4728: kintu tasyaivāvidyābuddhyādiprativimbitasyāvidyayā bhinnasya jīvatvaṃ prāptasya bandhamokṣāviti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4729: kalpitabhedo 'pi loke bimbapratibimbayordharmavyavasthāpako dṛṣṭa iti pariharati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4741: gatiḥ prāpyaṃ, saṃpadaiśvaryaṃ loko bogyaṃ sukhaṃ, caitasmādanyatrāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4742: ātmā svato 'kartā buddhyādyupādhinā tu kartetyubhayathābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4746: yathā sphaṭikasya lauhityaṃ kusumādyupādhikaṃ tathātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ buddhyādyupādhikamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siddham /
GSP33brsgor2u:4747: naca tau buddherātmakartṛtve karaṇatvaviṣayau nopādānatvaviṣayāviti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4750: nanu takṣā svahastādinā vāsyādipreraṇaśaktatvātsvataḥ kartā ātmā tu niravayavatvādaśakta iti dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyamāśaṅkyaupādhikakartṛtvāṃśena vivakṣitena sāmyamāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4752: śāstreṇānūdyamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ svābhāvikameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4756: kiñca karaṇairviśiṣṭasya kartṛtve teṣāṃ kartrantarbhāvātteṣvapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4764: kaṇatvaviśiṣṭasya kartṛtve karaṇeṣu kartṛvibhaktiḥ syāt, na karaṇavibhaktirityuktaṃ pratyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4767: asti ca kartṛtvaprayogaḥ, 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute'ityādāviti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4771: pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ jīva ityaṅgīkṛtya jīvasya kartṛtve tanuta iti śrutiruktā,
GSP33brsgor2u:4772: saṃprati tayā śrutyānupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvamiti prāptau vijñānaṃ buddhireva tasyā evātra kartṛtvamucyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:4775: 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādiśrutiṣu vijñānabdasya buddhau prasiddhatvādatra ca manomayakośānantaraṃ paṭhitatvācchraddhādiliṅgācca buddhireva vijñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4778: 'mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajam'ityādiśrutau hiraṇyagarbhabrahmātmakabuddherjyeṣṭhatvokteratra devairindriyairūpāsyamānaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ buddhirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4780: kiñca śrutyantare yajñasya buddhikāryatvokteratrāpi yajñakartṛvijñānaṃ buddhirityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4782: cittena dhyātvā vācā mantroktyā yajño jāyate tataścittasya vācaḥ pūrvottarabhāvo yajña ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4788: tarhi buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtve karaṇatvavārtā teṣu na syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4790: yathā kāṣṭhānāṃ svavyāpāre kartṛtve 'pi pākāpekṣayā karaṇatvaṃ tathā buddhyādīnāmadhyavasāyasaṃkalpādikriyākartṛtve 'pyupalabdhyapekṣayā karaṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4793: tarhi tasyāmātmā kevalaḥ kartā syāt, yasya yo vyāpāraḥ sa tasya karteti sthiterityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4795: upalabdhernityatve buddhyādīnāṃ kathaṃ karaṇatvamuktamiti ceducyate-akhaṇḍasākṣicaitanyaṃ buddhivṛttibhirbhinnaṃ sadviṣayāvācchinnatvena jāyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:4796: tathāca viṣayāvacchinnacaitanyākhyopalabdhau buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvaṃ buddhyādyupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ na kevalasya,
GSP33brsgor2u:4797: naca buddhereva tatkartṛtvaṃ caitanyasya jaḍavyāpāratvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4798: yaccoktaṃ buddheḥ kartṛtve sa evāhandhīgamyo jīva iti tasya karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4799: tathāca nāmamātre vivāda iti tatra kevalātmanaḥ kartṛtvamuktamiti bhrāntiṃ nirasyati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4801: sāṃkhyanirāsārthaṃ buddhyabhedenādhyastacidātmakāhaṅkāragataṃ kartṛtvaṃ yaduktaṃ tadahandhīgamyasya buddhiviśiṣṭātmana eva na kevalasya sākṣiṇo bhavitumarhati,
GSP33brsgor2u:4803: evaṃ viśiṣṭātmanaḥ kartṛtve viśeṣaṇībhūtāyā jaḍabuddhereva karaṇatvopapatterna karaṇāntarakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4804: adhyāsaṃ vinā kevalabuddhikartṛtvavādinastu karaṇāntaraprasaṅgo durvāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4813: yathā sphaṭike lauhityādhyāse lohitadravyaṃ karaṇaṃ tenāyaṃ sphaṭiko lohita ityanubhavāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:4815: tadadhyastaṃ kartṛtvamupajīvya jīvasya kārakasaṃpannatvādīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4825: pūrvaṃ jīvasya dharmādharmavattvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatsāpekṣatvādviṣamajagatkartṛtvamaviruddhamityuktaṃ saṃprati īśvarādhīnatve jīvasya kartṛtve siddhe dharmādharmavattvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4827: īśvarasya kārayitṛtve siddhe jīvasya kartṛtvasiddhiriti cakrakāpatteḥ karmasāpekṣatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyucyata ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4831: anapekṣasya pravartakatve dharmavato narān duḥkhenādharmavataḥ sukhena yojayet,
GSP33brsgor2u:4832: kāruṇikatve vā sarve sukhena ekarūpāḥ syuruti jagadvaicitryaṃ vidhyādiśāstraṃ ca na syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4833: tasmādvidhyādiśāstrārthavattvāya rāgadveṣāyattaṃ svata eva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4835: īśvarastāvikā vā sā śrutiriti prāpte siddhāntayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4837: yathā candanādisāmagryāṃ satyāṃ dharmavyatirike sukhavyatirekagrahābhāve 'pi 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati'ityādiśāstraprāmāṇyādeva dharmasya hetutvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4844: yadi viśeṣahetūnāṃ sādhāraṇahetvapekṣatvānna vaiyarthyaṃ tarhi īśvarasyāpi sādhāraṇahetutvānna vaiyarthyamityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4848: atidīrghavallīgranthayo gucchāḥ puṣpastabakā vā, gulmāstu hrasvavallya iti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4849: kimīśvarasya kārayitṛtve jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ na syādityāpādyate uta cakrakāpattirvā /
GSP33brsgor2u:4855: anavadyaṃ jīvasya kartṛtvamīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaṃ ceti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4858: evaṃ sāpekṣatve satyavaiyarthyaṃ bhavati, anyathānapekṣatve vaiyarthyaṃ prapañcayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4860: tayoḥ sthāne sa eva niyujyeta abhiṣicyeta /
GSP33brsgor2u:4861: tayoḥ kāryaṃ sa eva kuryāditi yāvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:4867: tasmāt karmasāpekṣeśvarasya kārayitṛtvāt 'eṣa hyeva'ityādiśrutervidhyādiśrutyavirodha iti siddham //42//
GSP33brsgor2u:4871: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke | BBs_2,3.43 |
GSP33brsgor2u:4874: nityaḥ svaprakāśo 'naṇurakartā jīva'iti śodhitatvaṃpadārthasyātra brahmaikyasādhanena bhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ virodhasamādhānātpādasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4878: prasiddhasvasvāmitvasaṃbandhasaṃbhavādyaḥ kaścit saṃbandha ityaniyamo na yukta ityarucerāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4883: lokasiddhānarthātmakabhedānuvāditvena bhedaśrutīnāṃ durbalatvādajñātaphalavadabhedaśrutyanusāreṇa prakalpitabhedanibandhanoṃ'śāṃśibhāvaḥ saṃbandha iti siddhāntayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4885: agneḥ sāṃśatve 'pi niṣkaleśvarasya kathaṃ sāṃśatvamata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4888: bheda eva cetsvasvāmibhāvo yukto nāṃśāṃśibhāva iti śaṅkate-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4892: vañcasi gacchasi yadāste yo nāmarūpe nirmāya praviśya vyavaharanvartate taṃ vidvānamṛto bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4900: asya sahasraśīrṣapuruṣasya tāvānprapañco mahimā vibhūtiḥ puruṣastasmātprapañcāt jyāyānmahattaraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4904: atra bhūtaśabdasya prāṇiṣu prayogātsūtroktamantre 'pi tatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4916: aupādhike īśvarasya niyantṛtve jīva eva tanniyantā kiṃ na syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4939: bhrāntau satyāṃ duḥkhamityanvayamuktvā bhrāntyabhāve duḥkhābhāvadarśanācca bhrāntikṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti niścīyata ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4942: jīvasyāpi samyagjñāne duḥkhābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ kimu vācyaṃ nityasarvajñeśvarasyetyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4944: evamaṃśitve hetoḥ sopādhikatvamuktvā yoṃ'śī sa vastutaḥ svāṃśadharmavānitī vyāptiṃ sthalatraye vyabhicārayati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4949: kiñca jīvasyeśvarasya vā vastuto duḥkhitvānumānaṃ na yuktamāgamabādhādityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4961: daśendriyāṇi pañca prāṇāḥ mano buddhiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4966: yato bāhyo 'saṅgastasmānna lipyate evamaṃśitvakṛtamīśvare doṣaṃ nirasyāṃśa ityuktaṃ jīvasyāṃśatvaṃ dehādyupādhikamiti sphuṭayitumatyantasvarūpaikyamādāyākṣipati-#
GSP33brsgor2u:4970: niravayavabrahmaṇo mukhyāṃśo na saṃbhavatīti vadatā siddhāntinā bhedo nāstītyuktaṃ bhavati,

GSP33brsgor2u:5489: karaṇāni tu gandhādipravṛttaye 'pekṣyante na caitanyāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5490: kiñca yo 'haṃ rūpamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ śṛṇomīti pratisaṃdhānādekaḥ śārīra eva bhoktā na bahavo devā ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5496: kadāciddevānāmatrabhoktṛtvaṃ kadācijjīvasyetyaniyamo 'stvityāśaṅkya svakarmārjite dehe jīvasya bhoktṛtvaniyamānmaivamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5501: yathā pradīpādiḥ karaṇopakārakatayā karaṇapakṣasyāntargatastathā devāḥ karaṇopakāriṇa eva na bhoktāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5503: devānāṃ tu karaṇopakārābhijñātayā sārathivadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamiti na jīvenānyathāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5504: devānāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvenāsmindehe bhoktṛtvānumānaṃ tu 'na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati'ityuktaśrutibādhitam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5505: tasmāt 'cakṣuṣā hi rūpāṇi paśyati'iti śruteḥ sādhanatvamātrabodhitvādagnirvāgbhūtvetyādyadhiṣṭhātṛdevatāpekṣābodhakaśrutibhiravirodha iti siddham //16//
GSP33brsgor2u:5509: ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśād anyatra śreṣṭhāt | BBs_2,4.17 |
GSP33brsgor2u:5510: satsvindriyeṣu tadadhiṣṭhātṛdevatācintā, tānyeva prāṇavṛttivyatirekeṇa na santītyākṣepaṃ pratyāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5514: hanta idānīmasyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya sarve vayaṃ svarūpaṃ bhavāmeti saṃkalpya te vāgādayastathābhavannityabhedaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5517: te prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhādanyatra anye iti pratijñārthatvena padatrayaṃ vyācaṣṭe-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5532: siddhānte manasaḥ pramopādānatvādātmavadanindriyatvamiṣṭaṃ tato notsargabādha iti kecit /
GSP33brsgor2u:5533: kiñca 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca'iti pṛthagjanmavyapadeśātsvatantravastubheda ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5535: ekasmin vākye prāṇa indriyaśabdamaikyāllabhate punaruktibhayānna labhate ceti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brsgor2u:5541: bhedaśruteriti sūtreṇa prakaraṇabhedo heturukta iti na paunaruktyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5542_0: te ha devāḥ śāstrīyendriyamanovṛttirūpā asurāṇāṃ pāpavṛttirūpāṇāṃ jayārthamudgīthakarmaṇi
GSP33brsgor2u:5542_2: vācamanṛtādidoṣeṇa vidhvaṃsitavantosurā ityevaṃ krameṇa sarveṣvindriyeṣu pāpagrasteṣu
GSP33brsgor2u:5542_3: paścādatheti prakaraṇaṃ vicchidya prasiddhamāsye bhavamāsanyaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇamūcustanna
GSP33brsgor2u:5542_4: tadgāyeti tena prāṇenodagātrā nirviṣayatayā saṅgadoṣaśūnyenāsurā naṣṭā ityasurāṇāṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:5554: etadeva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lakṣaṇābījaṃ śrutau 'tasmādeta etenākhyāyanta'iti parāmṛṣṭam,
GSP33brsgor2u:5560: utpattirutpādaneti ca kāryakartrorvyāpārau prasiddhau tatra jagadutpattiśrutivirodhaḥ atītena pādadvayaina nirastaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5570: hanta idānīṃ devatāḥ sūkṣmā anupraviśyeti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5571: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brsgor2u:5573: evaṃ sthūlīkṛteṣu bhūteṣu prāṇināṃ vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti paradevatāyāstātparyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5576: pūrvapakṣe jīvasyaiva bhautikasraṣṭṛtvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvasraṣṭṛtvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5579: paradevatāyā akartṛtve kathamuttamapuruṣaprayoga ityāśaṅkya prayojakatvātkartṛtvopacāra ityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5588: nanu tarhi praveśakriyā jīvakartṛkā vyākaraṇamīśvarakartṛkamiti kartṛbhedāt kṛtvāpratyayo na syādityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5590: vastutastu sūryo jale praviṣṭa iti pratibimbabhāvākhyapraveśe sūryasyaiva kartṛtvaprayogājjīvātmanā praveśe 'pīśvara eva karteti kṛtvāśrutiryukteti bodhyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5591: nanvabhedaścejjīva eva vyākartā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkya kalpanayā bhinnasya tasyāśaktatvācchrutivirodhācca maivamityāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5593: pratyekaṃ mahābhūtasargasya prāguktatvādiha vyākaraṇavākye yatnapūrvakaṃ sthīlabhautikasarga ucyata iti pāṭhavyatyayena sūtrasūcitaṃ śrutyarthamāha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5600: nanvagnyādīnāṃ taijasānāmeva śrutāvudāharaṇadbhūjalayosatryātmakatvaṃ na vivakṣitamityata āha-#
GSP33brsgor2u:5603: yatkapotarūpādikaṃ kṛṣṇatvādiviśeṣākāreṇa vijñātamiva bhavati taddevatānāṃ samudāyarūpamityarthaḥ //20//
GSP33brsgor2u:5611: uttarasūtreṇāśaṅkitaṃ doṣaṃ nirasitumādau śaṅkāviṣayamādhyātmikatrivṛtkaraṇaṃ darśayatīti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5627: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
